channel.title: Item dump
channel.description:
I dumped the armadyl crossbow models and definitions from the OSRS cache and added them into my client although i get this error when i spawn the item.
[CODE] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 54530 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:259) at Model.readOldModel(Model.java:884) at Model.<init>(Model.java:423) at Model.fetchModel(Model.java:1067) at ItemDef.getItemModelFinalised(ItemDef.java:3519) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:3402) at Client.drawInterface(Client.java:12971) at Client.drawTabArea(Client.java:2644) at Client.drawGameScreen(Client.java:12709) at Client.processDrawing(Client.java:13845) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:230) at Client.run(Client.java:8687) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [/CODE]
Could there be a problem with the model i am loading? i looked at my unpackConfig method and it seems like I'm loading the current length although not too sure as to why I'm getting this. I was getting a similar error with Zulrah, although it was fixed when i packed the correct animations.
Any help?
These are the definitions that i dumped swell Exact Definitions i dumped and used
[code] NAME: Armadyl crossbow MODEL ID: 19967 DESCRIPTION: It's an Armadyl crossbow. MODEL ZOOM: 1325 ROTATION (X/Y): 110/240 MODEL OFFSET (1/2): -6/-40 STACKABLE: false VALUE: 990000 MEMBERS: true MALE EQUIP (1/2/3): -1/19839/-1 MALE/FEMALE Y OFFSET: 0/6 FEMALE EQUIP (1/2/3): 19839/-1/-1 GROUND ACTIONS: [null, null, Take, null, null] ITEM ACTIONS: [null, Wield, null, null, Drop] MODIFIED/NEW MODEL COLORS: [115, 107, 10167, 10171]/[5409, 5404, 6449, 7390] MODEL OFFSET X: 0 SIZE (X/Y/Z): 128/128/128 SHADOW: 0 LIGHTNESS: -1
NAME: Armadyl crossbow MODEL ID: 2429 DESCRIPTION: null MODEL ZOOM: 760 ROTATION (X/Y): 28/552 MODEL OFFSET (1/2): 0/2 STACKABLE: true VALUE: 990000 MEMBERS: true MALE EQUIP (1/2/3): -1/-1/-1 MALE/FEMALE Y OFFSET: 0/0 FEMALE EQUIP (1/2/3): -1/-1/-1 GROUND ACTIONS: [null, null, Take, null, null] ITEM ACTIONS: [null, null, null, null, Drop] MODIFIED/NEW MODEL COLORS: null/null MODEL OFFSET X: 0 SIZE (X/Y/Z): 128/128/128 SHADOW: 0 LIGHTNESS: -1 [/code]

item.title: Item dump
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

I dumped the armadyl crossbow models and definitions from the OSRS cache and added them into my client although i get this error when i spawn the item.

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 54530 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:259) at Model.readOldModel(Model.java:884) at Model.<init>(Model.java:423) at Model.fetchModel(Model.java:1067) at ItemDef.getItemModelFinalised(ItemDef.java:3519) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:3402) at Client.drawInterface(Client.java:12971) at Client.drawTabArea(Client.java:2644) at Client.drawGameScreen(Client.java:12709) at Client.processDrawing(Client.java:13845) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:230) at Client.run(Client.java:8687) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)

Could there be a problem with the model i am loading? i looked at my unpackConfig method and it seems like I’m loading the current length although not too sure as to why I’m getting this. I was getting a similar error with Zulrah, although it was fixed when i packed the correct animations.

Any help?

These are the definitions that i dumped swell
